question: Hi the skin on my face hurts. i had blepharitis and an infection in my eyes but they're gone. I got tested got hiv, clamidia, syphlis, generea, hepatitis, diabetes and they were all negetive. i had a sinus scan and it was negetive. this has been going on for 4 months. it hurts more around my eyes. and burns also. do anybody have any ideas?
title: i have face pain.
